</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"Version","in":"header","description":"API 버전","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"1.0"},{"name":"clientId","in":"header","description":"쇼핑몰 클라이언트 아이디","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"test-client-id"},{"name":"platform","in":"header","description":"클라이언트 플랫폼 (PC, MOBILE_WEB, AOS, IOS)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"PC"},{"name":"language","in":"header","description":"언어 (기본값: ko)","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"ko"}]}

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}

  responses={{"200":{"description":"200","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"languages":{"type":"array","description":"다국어 설정","example":"[KO]","items":{"type":"string","enum":["KO: 한국어","ZH: 중국어","JA: 일본어","EN: 영어"]}},"currencies":{"type":"array","description":"통화 설정^|[CurrencyResponse(exchangeTo=KRW, exchangeRate=1)]","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"exchangeTo":{"type":"string","description":"통화","example":"USD"},"exchangeRate":{"type":"number","description":"1 통화(exchangeTo) 당 기준통화(KRW) 비율 ex) 1 USD 는 KRW 로 1100원","example":1100}}}}},"description":"","title":"malls-internationalization-1441815995"},"examples":{"get-malls-i18n":{"value":"{\n  \"languages\" : [ \"KO\" ],\n  \"currencies\" : [ {\n    \"exchangeTo\" : \"KRW\",\n    \"exchangeRate\" : 1\n  } ]\n}"}}}}}}}
